#define MAXN 10000+500 int n,m,num[2222][4]; int p(int x,int y) { int c=y-x; if(c<0) c+=3; return c; } int times(int i,int j, int t1,int t2,int t3) { int ans=0; if(j<=0||i<=0) return 0; if(i==j) ans+=t3; else if(i>j) ans+=times(j,i-j,t2,t3,t1)+p(t1,t3); else ans+=times(i,j-i,t1,t3,t2)+p(t2,t3); return ans; } int main() { while(scanf("%d%d",&n,&m)&&n+m!=-2) { if(n==-1&&m==-1) return 0; int t=n%3,a,b; if(t==0) a=1,b=2,t=3; else if(t==2) a=1,b=3; else a=2,b=3; int tot=0; for(int i=1; i<m; i++) { if(times(i,m-i,a,b,t)==n) { num[tot][a]=i; num[tot][b]=m-i; num[tot++][t]=m; } } printf("%d\n",tot); for(int i=0;i<tot;i++) printf("%d %d %d\n",num[i][1],num[i][2],num[i][3]); } return 0; } 10.1 å¿«ä¹!!!

â€™); } w = 3; h = n == 0 ? 1 : h * 3; }}
